verses.verse: And Joseph<WH3130> was brought down<WH3381> to Egypt<WH4714>; and Potiphar<WH6318>, an officer<WH5631> of Pharaoh<WH6547>'s, the captain<WH8269> of the guard<WH2876>, an Egyptian<WH376>, bought<WH7069> him of the hand<WH3027> of the Ishmaelites<WH3459>, that had brought him down thither<WH3381>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> was with Joseph<WH3130>, and he was a prosperous<WH6743> man<WH376>; and he was in the house<WH1004> of his master<WH113> the Egyptian<WH4713>.
And his master<WH113> saw<WH7200> that Jehovah<WH3068> was with him<WH3068>, and that Jehovah made all that he did<WH6213> to prosper<WH6743> in his hand<WH3027>.

And Joseph<WH3130> found<WH4672> favor<WH2580> in his sight<WH5869>, and he ministered<WH8334> unto him<WH6485>: and he made him overseer over his house<WH1004>, and all that he had<WH3426> he put<WH5414> into his hand<WH3027>.

And it came to pass from the time<WH227> that he made him overseer<WH6485> in his house<WH1004>, and over all that he had<WH3426>, that Jehovah<WH3068> blessed<WH1288> the Egyptian<WH4713>'s house<WH1004> for Joseph<WH3130>'s sake<WH1558>; and the blessing<WH1293> of Jehovah<WH3068> was upon all that he had<WH3426>, in the house<WH1004> and in the field<WH7704>.

And he left<WH5800> all that he had in Joseph<WH3130>'s hand<WH3027>; and he knew<WH3045> not aught<WH3972> that was with him<WH518>, save the bread<WH3899> which he did eat<WH398>. And Joseph<WH3130> was comely<WH8389>, and<WH3303> well-favored<WH4758>.
And it came to pass after<WH310> these things<WH1697>, that his master<WH113>'s wife<WH802> cast<WH5375> her eyes<WH5869> upon Joseph<WH3130>; and she said<WH559>, Lie with me<WH7901>.

But he refused<WH3985>, and said<WH559> unto his master<WH113>'s wife<WH802>, Behold<WH113>, my master knoweth<WH3045> not what is with me in the house<WH1004>, and he hath put<WH5414> all that he hath<WH3426> into my hand<WH3027>:

he is not greater<WH1419> in this house<WH1004> than I<WH3808>; neither hath he kept back<WH2820> anything<WH3972> from me but thee<WH834>, because thou<WH859> art his wife<WH802>: how then can I do<WH6213> this great<WH1419> wickedness<WH7451>, and sin<WH2398> against God<WH430>?
And it came to pass<WH1696>, as she spake to Joseph<WH3130> day<WH3117> by day<WH3117>, that he hearkened<WH8085> not unto her<WH7901>, to lie by her<WH681>, or to be with her.
And it came to pass about this time<WH3117>, that he went<WH935> into the house<WH1004> to do<WH6213> his work<WH4399>; and there was none of the men<WH376> of the house there within<WH1004>.
And she caught<WH8610> him by his garment<WH899>, saying<WH559>, Lie<WH7901> with me<WH5800>: and he left his garment<WH899> in her hand<WH3027>, and fled<WH5127>, and got<WH3318> him out<WH2351>.
And it came to pass<WH7200>, when she saw that he had left<WH5800> his garment<WH899> in her hand<WH3027>, and was fled<WH5127> forth<WH2351>,

that she called<WH7121> unto the men<WH582> of her house<WH1004>, and spake<WH559> unto them<WH559>, saying, See<WH7200>, he hath brought in<WH935> a Hebrew<WH376> unto us to mock<WH6711> us<WH935>: he came in unto me to lie<WH7901> with me<WH7121>, and I cried with a loud<WH1419> voice<WH6963>:

and it came to pass<WH8085>, when he heard that I lifted up<WH7311> my voice<WH6963> and cried<WH7121>, that he left<WH5800> his garment<WH899> by me<WH681>, and fled<WH5127>, and got him<WH3318> out<WH2351>.
And she laid up<WH3240> his garment<WH899> by her<WH681>, until his master<WH113> came<WH935> home<WH1004>.
And she spake<WH1696> unto him according to these words<WH1697>, saying<WH559>, The Hebrew<WH5680> servant<WH5650>, whom thou hast brought<WH935> unto us<WH935>, came in unto me to mock me<WH6711>:
and it came to pass<WH7311>, as I lifted up my voice<WH6963> and cried<WH7121>, that he left<WH5800> his garment<WH899> by me<WH681>, and fled<WH5127> out<WH2351>.

And it came to pass<WH113>, when his master heard<WH8085> the words<WH1697> of his wife<WH802>, which she spake<WH1696> unto him<WH559>, saying, After this manner<WH1697> did<WH6213> thy servant<WH5650> to me<WH639>; that his wrath was kindled<WH2734>.

And Joseph<WH3130>'s master<WH113> took<WH3947> him<WH5414>, and put him into the prison<WH1004>, the place<WH4725> where the king<WH4428>'s prisoners<WH615> were bound<WH631>: and he was there in the prison<WH1004>.
But Jehovah<WH3068> was with Joseph<WH3130>, and showed<WH5186> kindness<WH2617> unto him<WH5414>, and gave him favor<WH2580> in the sight<WH5869> of the keeper<WH8269> of the prison<WH1004>.

And the keeper<WH8269> of the prison<WH1004> committed<WH5414> to Joseph<WH3130>'s hand<WH3027> all the prisoners<WH615> that were in the prison<WH1004>; and whatsoever they did<WH6213> there<WH6213>, he was the doer of it.

The keeper<WH8269> of the prison<WH1004> looked<WH7200> not to anything<WH3972> that was under his hand<WH3027>, because Jehovah<WH3068> was with him<WH6213>; and that which he did, Jehovah<WH3068> made it to prosper<WH6743>.
